title: im quite done with this
body:
i just had a game where our team got rekt since we got first blooded and the zed player and olaf on my team started to troll intentionally not giving a shit about me, who was playing poorly, but still wanted to win somehow... i will get downvoted for this but i just wanted to vent my  anger on these two shit heads who made my game experience so frustrating and from now i will try and just play arams as they are less mind fucking with the trolls.

The Zed's name was called Agnolas
Link to op,gg: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Agnolas
and the Olaf's name was Triogon
link to op.gg: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Triogon

replies.body:
Seriously read forum...i mean board's rules.

Just get over it.

We don't wanna hear it.
don't name and shame, it's against forum rules.
name and shame, hope you get banned.
